item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $119,000
item.description: On July 22nd, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin rebounded and exceeded $11.9K. It is currently trading at $119,081, with a 24-hour percentage change of 0.42%.

item.title: A whale has transferred 300 BTC to Binance, equivalent to around $35.61 million
item.description: On July 22nd, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale once more transferred 300 Bitcoins into Binance, with a value of $35.61 million.Currently, the whale possesses 800 Bitcoins, which is approximately worth $95 million, and has achieved a realized profit of $93.33 million.

item.title: Glassnode: Ethereum Buyers Taking Profit Around $2520, New Buy Orders Absorbing Market Supply
item.description: July 22: Glassnode has presented the Ethereum Cost Basis Distribution Heatmap. It indicates that since July 1, Ethereum buyers have been realizing profits at around $2520. The red area is showing a gradual weakening trend. A considerable portion of buyers are still holding nearly 2 million ETH. Glassnode analysts stated that investors are making strategic profit-taking while the market generally anticipates further price hikes for Ethereum. The additional buying pressure is effectively absorbing market supply.

item.title: Institutional Ethereum Whale Holdings Change in the Last 30 Days: BMNR Holds 300,700 ETH, Ranking First
item.description: On July 22nd, based on the data from strategicethreserve, the following treasury companies and institutions with significant changes in Ethereum holdings within the past 30 days are as follows:Bitmine Immersion Tech (BMNR) took the first place. It is currently holding 300,700 ETH, which is approximately worth $11 billion. The 30-day holding increase is 84.29%.SharpLink Gaming (SBET) ranked second. It is currently holding 280,600 ETH, approximately worth $10.3 billion. The 30-day holding increase is 59.19%.The Ethereum Foundation ranked third, holding 238,500 ETH, worth approximately $8.737 billion. The 30-day holding decrease is 8.06%.Bit Digital (BTBT) ranked sixth, holding 120,300 ETH, worth approximately $4.407 billion. The 30-day holding increase is 335.53%.BTCS Inc (BTCS) ranked tenth, holding 55,800 ETH, worth approximately $2.044 billion. The 30-day holding increase is 282.11%.

item.title: Solana Network Achieves Real TPS Exceeding 1600 Temporarily
item.description: On July 22nd, based on Solscan data, the real TPS (True TPS) of the Solana network briefly exceeded 1600 and is currently reported at 1131.

item.title: The blockchain game Tokyo Beast will end its service on August 24th and will provide compensation to users.
item.description: On July 22nd, the blockchain game Tokyo Beast announced that it will cease its operations at 17:00 (Japan Standard Time) on Sunday, August 24, 2025, and will provide compensation to all users in USDC.Tokyo Beast is a cyberpunk-themed GameFi project launched by the Dubai blockchain game publisher TOKYO BEAST FZCO. The game production is led by Naoki Motohashi, who is from Japan and originally created Web2 social games.

item.title: OpenAI has announced a partnership with Oracle to develop a 4.5-gigawatt capacity data center.
item.description: On July 22nd, OpenAI announced a partnership with Oracle to further advance the development of a 4.5-gigawatt data center for the Stargate project. (Golden Ten)

item.title: "Brother Big Li" Huang Licheng's 5x Leveraged Long Position Faces $3.86 Million Unrealized Loss
item.description: On July 22nd, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, because PUMP dropped below its public sale price of $0.004, the "Big Brother Pump" Huang Licheng's PUMP 5x leveraged long position is currently facing a floating loss of $3.86 million. He also holds ETH 25x and HYPE 5x long positions, with a combined floating loss of $2.3 million.

item.title: Each Strategy Share is now up 20.8% against Bitcoin since the beginning of the year, with TD Cowen restating a $680 target price for MSTR.
item.description: On July 22nd: The investment bank TD Cowen stated that a strategic premium is reasonable. After increasing its holdings of BTC by an additional 6,220 coins last week, a portion of MSTR stock now represents 20.8% more Bitcoin than it did on January 1st. TD Cowen reaffirmed a target price of $680 for MSTR stock and anticipates that by 2027, the Strategy will hold nearly 900,000 BTC. The flywheel strategy of the Bitcoin treasury will continue to drive its momentum.

item.title: Binance Alpha has launched Delphinus Lab (ZKWASM)
item.description: On July 22nd, Binance Alpha has now initiated Delphinus Lab (ZKWASM).
